description: The Trumpet Creeper (Campsis tagliabuana 'Madame Galen') is truly amazing! Its vibrant rich colour is the perfect contrast to its deep green foliage. It will produce an abundance of showy, pink-orange blooms which are unmistakable when they are in full bloom. Not only are the flowers a true sight to behold, but the vine itself will quickly climb up a fence, mailbox, wall, or tree, allowing for easy vertical gardening. Pollinators love the nectar-rich flowers, and the vine adds texture, colour, and life to the garden all season long. It's truly a fantastic plant.
